mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_main_order( order_id, user_id, total_money, discount, total_freight, order_time, status ) VALUES ( #{orderId, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userId, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{totalMoney, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{discount, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{totalFreight, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{orderTime, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
